Two electric charges are interacting. The first charge carries ‚àí7,341 nC‚àí7,341 nC of charge, and the second carries ‚àí2,087 nC‚àí2,087 nC of charge.

The distance between the two charges is 3,921 cm3,921 cm.

Assume that both charges are point-like.

What is the magnitude of electrostatic force ùêπF, of the one charge on the other?

  • Round your answer to 3 decimal places after the decimal comma.

Answer: ùêπ=F= NN
